title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 35.12 - Effect of application denial
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 35.12 - Effect of application denial

State Regulations

Denial of an application for registration, driver's license
or privileges may be appealed to the department's Administrative Appeals Board
pursuant to article 3-A of the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
35.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
